channel.title: Oracle VirtualBox-5.1+Whonix Problem !!
channel.description:
Dear All
I've a problem importing appliance to VirtualBox my hosting machine is windows 10 64bit my whonix version is Whonix-Gateway-13.0.0.1.4 my virtualbox version is Oracle VirtualBox-5.1.26-117224-Win + Extension Pack Oracle_VM_VirtualBox_Extension_Pack-5.1.26-117224
I tried to import appliance to vbox then I receive an error with code 0x80BB0004 "Could not create the imported medium 'C:\Users\Yahia Mito\VirtualBox VMs\Whonix-Gateway\Whonix-Gateway-13.0.0.1.4-disk1.vmdk' (VERR_VD_VMDK_INVALID_FORMAT).
Result Code: VBOX_E_FILE_ERROR (0x80BB0004) Component: ApplianceWrap Interface: IAppliance {8398f026-4add-4474-5bc3-2f9f2140b23e} "
attached is an image of the error result
can you please help!! ![error|690x387](upload://rUc7KspqpXxj1USeElaGArX6CBQ.png)

item.title: Oracle VirtualBox-5.1+Whonix Problem !!
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
HI @mito_O

mito_O:

gpg: Signature made 12/20/16 20:04:16 Pacific Standard Time using RSA key ID 77BB3C48

gpg: Can’t check signature: No public key

You should not use the installer unless less you can verify it.

https://whonix.org/wiki/Installer/Verify_the_Installer_using_the_command_line

mito_O:

tried also to delete .VirtualBox folder & VirtualBox vms folder

uninstalling VirtualBox & reinstalling it

That was going to be my next suggestion. : )

mito_O:

if you could provide a torrent file

Sorry, don’t have one.

My suggestion would be to remove the Whonix part of your question as per the

https://whonix.org/wiki/Support#Free_Support_Principle

You may want to start off by trying to import a non-whonix VM into Vbox.

Also https://forums.virtualbox.org/ would be a good place to find additional help with your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Oracle VirtualBox-5.1+Whonix Problem !!
item.dc:creator: mito_O
item.description:
tried also to delete .VirtualBox folder & VirtualBox vms folder
uninstalling VirtualBox & reinstalling it

won’t help ,

if you could provide a torrent file for both gateway & workstation that would be awesome …

Read full topic

item.title: Oracle VirtualBox-5.1+Whonix Problem !!
item.dc:creator: mito_O
item.description:
EDITED…
E:\Whonix>gpg --verify-options show-notations --verify Whonix-Gateway-13.0.0.1.4.ova.asc Whonix-Gateway-13.0.0.1.4.ova
gpg: conversion from utf-8' toCP720’ not available
gpg: Signature made 12/20/16 20:04:16 Pacific Standard Time using RSA key ID 77BB3C48
gpg: Can’t check signature: No public key

Read full topic

Did you verify the installer?

https://whonix.org/wiki/Windows

item.title: Oracle VirtualBox-5.1+Whonix Problem !!
item.dc:creator: mito_O
item.description:
Dear All

I’ve a problem importing appliance to VirtualBox
my hosting machine is windows 10 64bit
my whonix version is Whonix-Gateway-13.0.0.1.4
my virtualbox version is Oracle VirtualBox-5.1.26-117224-Win + Extension Pack Oracle_VM_VirtualBox_Extension_Pack-5.1.26-117224

I tried to import appliance to vbox then I receive an error with code 0x80BB0004 "Could not create the imported medium ‘C:\Users\Yahia Mito\VirtualBox VMs\Whonix-Gateway\Whonix-Gateway-13.0.0.1.4-disk1.vmdk’ (VERR_VD_VMDK_INVALID_FORMAT).

Result Code:
VBOX_E_FILE_ERROR (0x80BB0004)
Component:
ApplianceWrap
Interface:
IAppliance {8398f026-4add-4474-5bc3-2f9f2140b23e}
"

attached is an image of the error result

can you please help!!

Read full topic
